column1: Odo Proudfoot ( - ) was a Hobbit of the Shire.
Odo was the son of Bodo Proudfoot and Bilbo Baggins aunt
column2: Linda Proudfoot and gave rise to a line of Proudfoot Family (or

column1: Odo was among the guests at the famous Bilbos Farewell Party at which Bilbo Baggins disappeared. At that time
column2: he was an elderly hobbit indeed
column3: being ninety-seven years old. He only lived for a few more years after the Party
column4: but from him had come at least two generations of descendants
column5: including his mischievous grandson Sancho Proudfoot
column6: who attempted to excavate for treasure in Bag End.

column1: The name Odo was meaningless in contemporary Hobbitish Westron. It represented an original name Oda.
